archimate:BusinessEvent.name: Poor quality security designs & lower productivity
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
The loss event "Poor Quality Security Designs & Lower Productivity" highlights the consequences of inadequate security integration in architectural designs.
Poor security designs expose systems to breaches, risking data, assets, and diminishing stakeholder trust. Additionally, rectifying these lapses diverts resources, leading to costly repairs and decreased productivity. This emphasizes the importance of proactive and robust security measures in all architectural projects.
